description:
Founded in 1962, the professional staff of Davidson Troilo Ream & Garza have been serving San Antonio, Central and South Texas with loyalty and integrity for more than 50 years. It was the vision of founder Robert Sawtelle to build an important regional firm, providing impeccable legal service to our fellow Texans.Today, the philosophy, organization and reputation of the firm still reflect his vision and goals.

The Firm has major client representations throughout the State of Texas in the following areas of law: administrative; appellate; banking; bankruptcy; commercial; construction; contract; corporations; creditors' rights; environmental; estate planning; health care; insurance; international; labor relations; litigation; municipal; probate; products liability; professional malpractice; real estate; school; taxation; tort; utilities and water.

We provide a wide variety of legal services for a broad spectrum of clients. We represent individuals, small businesses, public agencies, major corporations, financial institutions and other clients, large and small.

We are proud of our lawyers who possess a strong combination of experience and youth. A number of our lawyers are experienced and successful litigators. Others are highly skilled in corporate matters, real estate transactions and government regulations. Just as we have lawyers who are bilingual, we also have lawyers and professional staff who are conversant in the technical languages of science, engineering, medicine and industry.

To ensure continuing and consistent professional service, we recruit the brightest and best new attorneys from leading law schools. In order to add a special depth of experience to our legal team, we have staffed our firm with lawyers and professional staff who have held responsible positions in both business and government. Our longstanding involvement in civic and governmental affairs locally and at the state and national levels is proof of our commitment to staying abreast and involved with issues and legislation that impact our clients.

At Davidson Troilo Ream & Garza, our goal is to excel in carefully selected areas. Our most important goal is to serve our clients.
